subtitle:
The stuffing adds texture and taste to white fish.
Try serving this recipe with red pepper salsa... it makes an unusual and tasty dish.

method.text: Cook onion gently in melted butter. Add celery, tomatoes, breadcrumbs and parsley. Season well.
Make a slit along each piece of fish and fill with stuffing. Arrange in an ovenproof dish, sprinkle with lemon juice and rind, water, herbs and pepper corns. Cover and poach in oven for 30 min.
Arrange the fish on a hot serving dish and keep warm.
Strain liquor into pan and bring to boil.

Mix cornflour to paste with water. Add fish liquor, stirring, and return to pan. Bring back to boil, simmer for few minutes. Stir in cream, reheat, adjust seasoning to taste and pour over fish and serve.

title: Fish Mediterranee
